mapper.insert: INSERT INTO checkin_point (name, target_type, target_id, target_name, image_url, location, checkin_count, is_active, create_time, update_time, del_flag) VALUES (#{name}, #{targetType}, #{targetId}, #{targetName}, #{imageUrl}, #{location}, 0, #{isActive}, NOW(), NOW(), 0)
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, target_type, target_id, target_name, image_url, location, checkin_count, is_active, create_time, update_time, create_by, update_by, del_flag FROM checkin_point WHERE id = #{id} AND del_flag = 0 LIMIT 1
